title: Super Smash Bros.
short_plot_summary: Iconic characters from various video game franchises come together to battle each other in intense, action-packed matches.
explanation: A fist, representing the close-quarters combat between characters in the game
A star, symbolizing the iconic status of the characters and the shoot-for-the-stars competitive nature of the game
A joystick, illustrating the game's roots as a popular video game with multiplayer gameplay
A boxing glove, emphasizing the fighting aspect of the game and the heated battles between characters
A trophy, signifying the ultimate goal of players to become the champion in their matches and tournaments
